definition: to take over by force/to rob/to plunder/to brush over/to skim/to sweep
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
to flit across/to sweep past/to glance (strike at an angle)
flickering light and passing shadows (idiom)/blurred scenery/cursory/superficial
to claim credit due to others
to press-gang sb and sell into slavery
Chinese people press-ganged and sold into slavery during Western colonialism

sentences.english: This has been an active year for big, bright sungrazers.
sentences.chinese: 今年是明亮的掠日彗星的活躍年。

sentences.english: For many things are done with a view to rapine.
sentences.chinese: 因爲有許多事是爲了刼掠而做的。

sentences.english: Predatory fish that eat other fish also build up contaminants.
sentences.chinese: 喫其它魚類爲生的掠食性魚也會累積污染物。

sentences.english: Wolves prowled the forest in search of prey.
sentences.chinese: 老虎向它的捕掠對象撲過去。

sentences.english: Themore quickly she gives in, the less likely she'll be fish food.
sentences.chinese: 它們越早就範，成爲掠食性魚類盤中餐的風險就越小。

sentences.english: The deadly predator, poised to sink its irresistable fangs; 2 crystals.
sentences.chinese: 致命的掠食者，極具誘惑的尖牙，鑲兩顆水晶。

sentences.english: When a puff of wind ruffles the surface, wavelets disturb the surface and the reflections disappear.
sentences.chinese: 一陣風掠過水麪，微波打亂了水面，倒影也不見了。
螢火蟲的幼蟲是有毒的掠食者。

sentences.english: He made a quick drop, slanting down on his backswept wings, and then circled again.
sentences.chinese: 它倏地斜着後掠的雙翅俯衝，然後又盤旋起來。

sentences.english: The stone dapped along the surface of the pond.
sentences.chinese: 石片在池塘表面上掠跳。

sentences.english: Saw-scale vipers are their most feared predators.
sentences.chinese: 蝰蛇是它們最怕的掠食者。

sentences.english: All of the following are Class features of the Raider .
sentences.chinese: 以下所有的都是掠襲者的角色特徵。

sentences.english: Take care not to offend her. She always smites with the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 他總是恭順地把他掠到的大部分財物送給她。

sentences.english: The measurement of liquid refractive index by grazing met- hod is based upon the principle of total reflection.
sentences.chinese: 掠射法測液體折射率是根據光的全反射原理。

definition: to flit across/to sweep past/to glance (strike at an angle)
to blow (as of wind)/sound of wind/sough
(of a meteor etc) to streak across (the sky)/(of a searchlight, lightning etc) to play across (the sky)
to float in the air/swiftly/nimbly/easy and relaxed
